text: Hi Everyone! I made a module same as the code of pulling the blog list on the blog I made before. I put the module on the landing page and I layout it like a recent blog post, And when I'm creating a new blog post, the new blog is updating on the blog itself, but it's not updating on my module I made same as the code of the blog. But on the developer's preview it's updating, but on the landing page it's not updating. What could be the reason for that?
Hello friends, does anyone know how to give parameters to a module that has a repeating element inside another repeating element from the template? thanks.
